Element.question: Please enter your name
Are you a
Element.choices: Smoker,Non Smoker,Drug Addict,Tobacco,Alcoholic,None

Element.question: Do You (including yourself) smoke cigarettes inside your home every day or most days?
Element.choices: Yes,No,Don't know

Element.question: Which of those statements best describes you now?
Element.choices: I have no thoughts of quitting smoking, I think I need to consider quitting smoking someday, I think I should quit smoking but I’m not quite ready, I think about doing things that will help me quit smoking, I’m doing things that will help me quit smoking, Don’t know

Element.question: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
Element.choices: Monthly or less,Up to 3 times a week, Up to 4 times a month, 4 or more times a week

Element.question: How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?
Element.choices: One or two, Three or four , Five or six, Seven to nine, Ten or more

Element.question: When was the last time that you saw a medical specialist?
Element.choices: Within the last 4 weeks, More than four weeks and less than 12 weeks (3 months), More than 12 weeks and less than 24 weeks (6 months), More than 6 months ago, Don’t know

Element.question: Tell about your food habits
Element.choices: Mostly rice based food, Rice and wheat, Rice and other cereal like millet, corn etc, Other

Element.question: Reading a book or newspaper?
Element.choices: No difficulty, A little bit of difficulty, Moderate difficulty, Quite a bit of difficulty, Extreme difficulty/cannot see, I cannot read

Element.question: . During the past 4 weeks, how much difficulty (using a hearing aid if you usually do) did you have in hearing what is said in a conversation with one
Element.choices: No difficulty, Quite a bit of difficulty, A little bit of difficulty, Extreme difficulty/cannot hear, Moderate difficulty

Element.question: Have constipation (difficulty with passing bowel motions)?
Element.choices: All the time,Some of the time, Most of the time ,A little of the time, A good bit of the time,None of the time

Element.question: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time did you have indigestion, e.g. burning in the stomach, 'heartburn'?
Element.choices: All the time,Some of the time, Most of the time ,A little of the time, A good bit of the time,None of the time

Element.question: Get short of breath at rest?
Element.choices: All the time,Some of the time, Most of the time ,A little of the time, A good bit of the time,None of the time

Element.question: Where did you have pain? (Record below. Multiple response.)
Element.choices: Head (headache, migraines), Neck, Back, Stomach or abdomen, Arms, Hands, Legs, Feet Face or jaw or the joint just below the ear,Chest,None

Element.question: Waking up frequently during the night?
Element.choices: All the time,Some of the time, Most of the time ,A little of the time, A good bit of the time,None of the time

Have any of the members of your immediate family or other relatives been diagnosed with diabetes (type 1 or type 2)?
